title: Over The Moon
description: Three bestselling superstars and one exciting new voice in paranormal romance in a hot new anthology.  When it comes to sexy werewolves, fairies, and magic, there's only one place for readers to go this winter: Over the Moon.  Angela Knight ventures to the borders of Mageverse, a land ruled by vampire knights.  MaryJanice Davidson returns to the wicked lair of the Wyndham werewolves.  Virginia Kantra finds magic and wonder in a strange fairy kingdom.  And Sunny discovers a Mixed Blood Queen in command of a new realm.
author: Angela Knight
